metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17358 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Cacti through 1.2.7 is affected by multiple instances of lib/functions.phpunsafe deserialization of user-controlled data to populate arrays. Anauthenticated attacker could use this to influence object data values andcontrol actions taken by Cacti or potentially cause memory corruption inthe PHP module.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
